archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.3.7b: b) responding to security issues in a manner that addresses the app-specific aspects, such as performing device forensics and initiating remote wipes of devices and information.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
